label: OperationalParameter
comment: A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions within which an entity operates correctly.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication whether or not this control setting parameter is changeable.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.
A value, expressed as text, for this document characteristic.
The indication of whether or not the value for this specified parameter is allowed.

objectProperties.comment: A defined range specified for this operational parameter.
A measure of a value for this document characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: An operational parameter defined for this monitoring sensor.
